metadata.description: Spells that control, manipulate, and direct human bodies and their functions

spells.name: Lifting the Dangling Puppet
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to control the gross motor movements of a human target, making them walk, gesture, or move as the caster desires. The victim retains consciousness and can speak, but their body obeys the caster's will completely.

spells.name: Leap of Homecoming
spells.description: This powerful spell instantly transports a person to any location the caster can visualize clearly, such as their home or a familiar place. The journey is instantaneous and covers any distance, though it requires an Arcane Connection to the target.

spells.name: Spasms of the Uncontrolled Hand
spells.description: This spell causes uncontrollable spasms in the target's limbs, making fine motor control impossible. The victim cannot write, cast spells with somatic components, or perform any task requiring dexterity. Their hands shake and twitch constantly.

spells.name: The Phantom's Painful Touch
spells.description: This spell manipulates the target's nervous system to create sensations of pain without actual injury. The victim experiences intense agony that can incapacitate them, but no physical damage occurs. The pain ends when concentration is broken.

spells.name: Rigid Bonds of Iron
spells.description: This spell causes the target's muscles to lock rigid, preventing all movement. The victim becomes as stiff as a statue, unable to move any part of their body. They remain conscious and can see and hear, but are completely paralyzed.

spells.name: Seven-League Stride
spells.description: This spell allows the target to take enormous strides, covering vast distances with each step. Each stride can cover up to a mile, allowing rapid travel across the countryside. The person must still walk, but each step propels them far forward.

spells.name: Curse of the Sleeping Death
spells.description: This curse forces the target into a death-like sleep that lasts for a full year. They appear completely dead to casual examination, breathing so slowly as to be undetectable. The victim ages normally during this time but remains unconscious throughout.

spells.name: Control the Heartbeat's Rhythm
spells.description: This spell gives the caster direct control over the target's heartbeat and circulation. The heart can be made to race, slow down, or even stop temporarily. Careful control can induce unconsciousness, while more aggressive use can cause death.

spells.name: Gift of the Bear's Fortitude
spells.description: This spell enhances the target's physical endurance and resilience, allowing them to function without fatigue for an entire day. They need no sleep, food, or rest, and can perform strenuous activities continuously without becoming tired.

spells.name: Walk on the Gossamer Air
spells.description: This spell allows the target to walk on air as if it were solid ground. They can climb invisible stairs, walk across gaps, or stand suspended in midair. The effect requires concentration to maintain balance but feels natural once mastered.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (alter body interaction with environment), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Strings of the Unwilling Marionette
spells.description: This powerful spell allows the caster to control multiple people simultaneously, directing their movements like a puppeteer. Each target moves according to the caster's will, creating an eerie display of synchronized motion among the controlled victims.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (control multiple bodies), +3 Sight, +1 Concentration, +2 Group

spells.name: Posture of the Righteous Judge
spells.description: This spell forces the target to maintain perfect posture and bearing, making them appear dignified and authoritative. Their spine straightens, shoulders square, and every movement becomes graceful and controlled. This can enhance social interactions and presence.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (control posture and bearing), +2 Voice, +2 Sun
